import{create}from'zustand';const useStore=create(set=>({// Login 상태 관련
is_login:false,setIsLogin:newstate=>set({is_login:newstate}),// ACESS_TOKEN 관련
ACCESS_TOKEN:'',setAcessToken:token=>set({ACCESS_TOKEN:token}),// generatedimageurl
generatedimageurl:'',setGeneratedImageUrl:imageurl=>set({generatedimageurl:imageurl}),// prompt 관련
prompt:'',setPrompt:dalle_prompt=>set({prompt:dalle_prompt})}));export default useStore;
